titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, Undated

mods.tableOfContents: Cheyenne Informant. Mufas Miakafada, Arabic student. Comanche student of Ethel Haury. Comanche hymn by students of Ethel Haury. Comanche verse by student of Swan Yackesha. Kiowa Christmas story by student of Mrs. Caprie Redbird. Kiowa hymn by student of Mr. & Mrs. Redbird and Myrtle Paddlety Kaulety.. Kiowa hymn - First Kiowa hymn written by Myrtle Kaulety's father.. Kiowa hymn - Sung by students of Mr. & Mrs. Redbird and Mrs. Kaulety.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
